Delete your history and much more, in one click.

“Delete History Plus” was created by security portal vpnMentor.com to protect your privacy online. You no longer need to fight your way to Chrome’s advances settings to clear your browser from cookies or browsing history.

This extension will simply add a small button on your browser. You can click on it and select what data you wish to remove from your browser.
 
This extension is ad free and we appreciate your support by ranking it on Chrome Web Store.

To learn more visit https://www.vpnmentor.com
